Description:
Functional Features: This object is an industrial workbench, used to provide an operating surface for industrial production, maintenance, assembly and other scenarios. It can be used to place tools and components, and support manual or small equipment operations. Its application scenarios include workshop assembly stations, equipment maintenance areas, laboratory operation platforms, etc. It can meet the bearing and space requirements of various industrial operations, and improve the convenience and standardization of operations.
Visual Features: The main body is eye-catching yellow. The material is presumed to be a metal frame with a wear-resistant tabletop (such as engineering plastic or metal plate). The surface treatment is smooth and the color is uniform. The yellow appearance is highly recognizable against the black background. The overall design is concise and practical, highlighting the functionality and warning nature of industrial equipment.

Functional Features: This object is an industrial workbench with a storage rack, used to provide an operating surface and storage space for scenarios such as industrial assembly, electronic maintenance, and laboratory operations. It can place tools and components, and the upper storage rack can also classify and store materials or appliances. Its application scenarios include component assembly stations in electronic workshops, precision instrument maintenance areas, and scientific research laboratory operation platforms. It can meet the bearing and storage needs during operations, improving operational convenience and space utilization.
Visual Features: The main body is made of silver-gray metal, with a smooth surface and metallic luster. The overall design is concise and practical. The hollow structure of the upper storage rack and the lower paper roll device add functional details. The silver-gray appearance against the black background highlights the professionalism and neatness of industrial equipment.

Functional Features: This object is a workbench with a storage drawer, used to provide an operating surface and storage space for scenarios such as handicraft making, small-scale assembly, and daily office work. It can place tools and materials, and the drawer can store small parts or stationery. Its application scenarios include handicraft workstations in maker studios, simple assembly areas in small workshops, and home handicraft operation platforms. It can meet the bearing and storage needs during operations, improving operational convenience and space tidiness.
Visual Features: The main frame is yellow, matched with a light wood-colored tabletop and a turquoise drawer. The material combines metal (frame) and solid wood (tabletop). The surface treatment shows the solid texture of metal and the natural texture of solid wood. The color matching is lively and eye-catching, with high visual recognition against the black background. The overall design is both practical and somewhat decorative.

Functional Features: This workbench is a high-precision optical platform primarily used for mounting and securing various optical components such as lenses, mirrors, and lasers. Its functional features include providing a stable, low-vibration environment, making it ideal for optical experiments and measurements in fields like physics, engineering, and photonics. The surface is covered with a grid of threaded holes, allowing flexible configuration and secure installation of components. It supports diverse experimental setups and quick adjustments, widely used in research labs, educational institutions, and advanced manufacturing.
Visual Features:Visually, the workbench has a sleek silver-gray appearance with a brushed metal finish, reflecting an industrial and professional aesthetic. It is typically made of high-strength stainless steel or aluminum alloy, offering corrosion resistance and structural stability. The tabletop is flat with evenly distributed holes, showcasing high manufacturing precision and engineering elegance. The sturdy support frame often includes vibration isolation features to minimize external interference and enhance measurement reliability and repeatability.

Functional Features:This image features a modern, minimalist white desk with distinct functional and visual characteristics. Functionally, the desk is ideal for home offices, study areas, or workspaces, catering to users who value organization and efficiency. One side of the desk is supported by an X-shaped leg, while the other side includes multiple shelves or drawers for storing stationery, documents, or electronic accessories. An elevated monitor stand is positioned at the back right corner of the desk, promoting ergonomic posture and enhancing productivity. The sturdy structure supports computers, books, and other office essentials, making it suitable for home studies, offices, or student dormitories.
Visual Features:Visually, the desk is finished in a crisp white color, creating a clean and refreshing aesthetic that blends easily with various interior styles. The material appears to be wood or composite board, with a smooth surface treatment that gives it a matte or semi-gloss finish, enhancing its contemporary appeal. The X-shaped leg adds both structural support and a geometric design element, contributing to a dynamic and stylish look. The overall design is sleek and streamlined, aligning with modern minimalist trends.

Functional Features:This is a modular mobile platform combining a wheeled base with an aluminum profile support structure, commonly used in robotics experiments, sensor deployment, educational demonstrations, or automated testing. Its functional features include high mobility, structural expandability, and integration capability for devices such as cameras, LiDARs, robotic arms, or other sensors. It is suitable for indoor navigation, data collection, and human-robot interaction testing. The platform includes side handles and a top cutout for easy equipment installation and maintenance, and it aligns with simulation environments like Isaac Sim for coordinate mapping and control algorithm validation.
Visual Features:Visually, the platform consists of a matte black rectangular base made of metal or composite material, offering a durable and industrial appearance. It is equipped with four swivel caster wheels for smooth movement on flat surfaces. Side handles enhance portability. The attached L-shaped frame is built from silver-gray aluminum extrusion profiles, secured with standard corner brackets, providing excellent modularity and expansion potential. The overall design emphasizes structural stability and functional flexibility, making it a versatile foundation for research, education, and engineering development.

Functional Features:This is a high-precision optical breadboard table, widely used in optical experiments, laser system assembly, interferometry, optical communication testing, and precision alignment tasks. Its functional features include excellent stability, vibration damping, and a flexible hole grid layout, making it ideal for mounting optical mounts, lenses, lasers, fiber couplers, and other components. The surface is covered with a matrix of threaded holes for modular setup and repeatable positioning. Commonly found in university labs, photonics R&D centers, and automated testing systems, this platform—manufactured by Thorlabs—offers high compatibility and precision.
Visual Features:Visually, the table features a matte-finished stainless steel surface in silver-gray, providing anti-reflective, corrosion-resistant, and wear-resistant properties. The hole grid is evenly spaced in a rectangular pattern for precise alignment and secure mounting. The supporting frame is made of metal, likely anodized aluminum, with adjustable feet for leveling and vibration isolation. The overall design is clean and robust, emphasizing stability and repeatability in experimental environments, making it an essential foundation in optics and precision engineering.

Functional Features:This is an industrial-grade packing table, commonly used in warehouses, assembly lines, laboratories, and manufacturing workstations. Its functional features include providing a sturdy and stable surface for tasks such as sorting, packaging, assembly, and inspection. The lower dual-shelf design offers convenient storage for tools, materials, or in-process items, enhancing workflow efficiency and space utilization. With a robust structure, it is well-suited for high-frequency, heavy-duty industrial environments and can also serve as a base for robotic workstations or collaborative setups.
Visual Features:Visually, the table is constructed entirely from metal with a dark gray or black powder-coated finish, offering excellent wear and corrosion resistance. The tabletop is flat and rectangular with rounded edges for safe handling and easy cleaning. The four legs are thick and reinforced, with wide footpads to ensure ground stability. The lower shelf is made of metal panels with a central support beam to increase load capacity. The overall design emphasizes practicality, modularity, and industrial durability, making it ideal for demanding operational settings.

Functional Features:This is an industrial-grade metal platform designed for high load-bearing capacity and structural stability, suitable for use in factories, laboratories, equipment maintenance zones, or cleanrooms. Its functional features include supporting machinery, serving as a work surface, and facilitating ventilation or drainage. The top surface is perforated with evenly spaced circular holes, promoting airflow, preventing liquid accumulation, and allowing for fixture mounting or alignment tasks. The four adjustable legs with round bases ensure stability and adaptability to uneven floors, making it ideal for environments requiring precise leveling and safety.
Visual Features:Visually, the platform is constructed from bright yellow metal with a powder-coated finish, offering excellent corrosion resistance and wear durability. The vivid color also serves as a safety indicator in industrial settings. The rectangular structure features rounded edges and a uniformly perforated surface, reflecting a high degree of industrial standardization and functional design. The legs are silver-gray metal with robust construction and circular bases for enhanced ground contact. Overall, the design emphasizes practicality, safety, and adaptability, making it a common and reliable fixture in modern industrial and research environments.

Functional Features:This is a metal support platform designed for industrial or laboratory use, offering height adjustability and multifunctional fixture capability. It is suitable for scientific experiments, precision assembly, equipment stabilization, or operations in clean environments. Functionally, it features a central vertical rod for securing containers or instruments, a perforated surface for ventilation, drainage, or fixture mounting, and four threaded adjustable legs with round bases to ensure stability on uneven surfaces. This platform is ideal for lab benches, electronics assembly lines, or industrial inspection zones where operational stability and spatial flexibility are critical.
Visual Features:Visually, the platform is made of bright yellow metal with a powder-coated finish, providing excellent corrosion resistance and wear durability. The vivid color also serves as a safety indicator. The square structure has rounded edges and a grid of evenly spaced holes, reflecting a high level of industrial standardization. The central vertical rod is silver-gray, contrasting with the yellow base for visual clarity. The legs are robust, with clearly defined threads and wide circular bases for enhanced ground contact. The overall design emphasizes functionality, modularity, and adaptability, making it a reliable support device in modern scientific and industrial settings.

Functional Features:This object is a professional packing workstation, commonly used in warehouses, logistics centers, e-commerce fulfillment, and manufacturing settings. Its primary function is to provide an efficient and organized platform for packing operations. The station features a sturdy stainless steel worktable with foldable legs for easy mobility and storage. Above the table are two horizontal dispensers for kraft paper or similar materials, allowing quick access and cutting. A top shelf with multiple vertical dividers is designed for organizing packing supplies like boxes, labels, or tape. Additionally, a large roll of packing material is mounted below the table for convenient use, emphasizing functionality and space efficiency.
Visual Features:Visually, the workstation presents a sleek industrial look with a silver-gray color scheme. The stainless steel construction offers corrosion resistance and easy maintenance, ideal for high-frequency use. Its smooth surface and rounded edges enhance both safety and aesthetics. The overall design is clean and modular, supporting adaptability for various operational needs.

Functional Features:This object is a robust, multifunctional workbench designed for a variety of tasks such as crafting, food preparation, or mechanical repair. It features a spacious wooden tabletop supported by a metal frame, combining practicality with durability. The smooth surface is ideal for detailed work or tool placement, while the lower metal shelf offers convenient storage for frequently used items. This type of table is commonly found in workshops, kitchens, and laboratories where a stable and versatile work surface is essential.
Visual Features:Visually, the table showcases a contrast between natural wood tones and industrial gray metal, creating a modern industrial aesthetic. The wooden top is polished and smooth, offering a warm texture and easy maintenance. The metal components are likely treated with anti-rust coating or powder finish, enhancing durability and safety. The overall design is clean and well-proportioned, balancing functionality with visual appeal, making it suitable for various interior settings.

Functional Features:This object is a stainless steel work table known for its durability and hygienic properties, making it ideal for use in industrial kitchens, laboratories, and workshops. Its functional design features a spacious, flat top surface suitable for food preparation, scientific experiments, or mechanical assembly. A lower open shelf provides additional storage for tools, utensils, or materials, enhancing workspace organization. The four square metal legs offer excellent stability and load-bearing capacity, ensuring reliable performance under heavy-duty use.
Visual Features:Visually, the table has a sleek silver-gray appearance that reflects a modern industrial aesthetic. The stainless steel construction provides a clean, metallic sheen and resists corrosion and rust, making it suitable for long-term use. The surface is likely brushed or polished, offering a smooth texture that is easy to clean and maintain—ideal for sanitary environments. The overall form is straightforward and professional, emphasizing functionality and adaptability in demanding work settings.

Functional Features:This object is a heavy-duty multifunctional workbench, commonly used in workshops, garages, and industrial settings for tasks such as assembly, repair, or sanding. Its functional features include a spacious wooden tabletop that provides a solid and impact-resistant work surface, and a lower metal shelf for storing tools, components, or materials—enhancing efficiency and space utilization. The metal legs have perforations, likely for height adjustment or securing the bench, adding flexibility and safety to its use.
Visual Features:Visually, the workbench reflects a modern industrial aesthetic. The wooden top is a light natural brown, polished for a smooth texture and easy maintenance. The metal frame is dark gray or black, likely treated with powder coating or anti-rust finish to improve durability and corrosion resistance. The overall design is clean and well-proportioned, balancing functionality with visual appeal, making it suitable for a variety of industrial or maker environments.

Functional Features:This object is a heavy-duty industrial-style workbench designed for demanding work environments such as workshops, laboratories, repair stations, or manufacturing facilities. Its functional features include a robust metal frame and a spacious, flat work surface ideal for assembly, maintenance, or testing tasks. A secondary shelf beneath the main tabletop provides additional storage for tools, components, or materials, enhancing workspace efficiency. The legs feature evenly spaced holes, likely for height adjustment or floor anchoring, offering flexibility and improved safety.
Visual Features:Visually, the workbench has a dark gray tone that conveys a strong industrial aesthetic. The work surface is solid and smooth, making it easy to clean and maintain—suitable for high-frequency use. The metal frame is treated with powder coating or anti-corrosion finish, ensuring durability and resistance to wear. The overall design is straightforward and functional, with clean lines and a focus on structural stability, making it a fitting addition to modern technical or industrial environments.

Functional Features:This object is a robust, multifunctional workbench commonly used in workshops, garages, laboratories, and industrial settings. A metal shelf beneath the tabletop provides convenient storage for tools or materials, improving operational efficiency. The top is constructed from multiple wooden strips, giving it a butcher-block appearance. It is polished and likely sealed for durability and a smooth finish. The metal frame is treated with powder coating or anti-rust finish, offering a sleek surface and long-term corrosion resistance. The overall design is clean and well-proportioned, balancing functionality with visual appeal, making it suitable for a range of technical or maker spaces.

Functional Features:This object is a multifunctional workstation designed for use in laboratories, electronics assembly areas, educational settings, or light industrial environments. Its functional features include a spacious blue tabletop suitable for precision tasks, assembly, or documentation. Above the work surface are multiple storage shelves with vertical dividers, ideal for organizing documents, tools, or components for quick access. Below the tabletop are three open compartments that provide additional storage, helping maintain a clean and organized workspace. The overall structure is sturdy and built for frequent, long-term use.
Visual Features:Visually, the workstation features a modern and professional aesthetic with a blue and metallic gray color scheme. The blue work surface is made of a composite material that is smooth, durable, and easy to clean. The frame is constructed from metal and treated with powder coating or anti-rust finish, enhancing its durability and structural integrity. The design emphasizes functionality and modularity, with clean lines and balanced proportions, making it well-suited for efficient and organized work environments.

Functional Features:This object is a multifunctional metal workbench designed for use in industrial, mechanical repair, laboratory, or tool management settings. Its functional features include a flat and sturdy work surface suitable for assembly, maintenance, or measurement tasks. Beneath the tabletop is a lockable drawer for secure storage of tools or components. The perforated back panel allows for the mounting of hooks or tool holders, optimizing vertical space. Additionally, three small compartments above the work surface provide convenient organization for frequently used items. The adjustable legs enhance ergonomic flexibility and adaptability to various work conditions.
Visual Features:Visually, the workbench has a sleek silver-gray appearance, reflecting a modern industrial aesthetic. It is constructed from stainless steel or high-strength metal, with a sandblasted or brushed finish that offers corrosion resistance, durability, and ease of maintenance. The design features clean, angular lines and well-balanced proportions, emphasizing practicality and professionalism. Overall, the workstation integrates multiple functions and supports efficient, organized workflows in demanding environments.

Functional Features:This object is an integrated metal tool workstation designed for workshops, repair garages, laboratories, and industrial environments, aiming to improve tool organization and operational efficiency. Its functional features include a spacious flat work surface suitable for assembly, repair, and inspection tasks. The perforated pegboard at the back allows flexible hanging of tools, maximizing vertical space, while the upper shelf provides additional storage for frequently used items. Below the work surface are multiple drawers and a cabinet with doors for categorized storage of tools, parts, and supplies. Equipped with caster wheels, the unit is mobile and adaptable to dynamic workspaces.
Visual Features:Visually, the workstation features a modern industrial aesthetic with a combination of dark gray and silver tones. It is constructed from high-strength metal with a powder-coated or anti-rust finish, offering excellent durability and corrosion resistance for frequent use. The design is compact and streamlined, with clean lines and balanced proportions, emphasizing functional integration and space optimization. Its professional and practical appearance makes it a fitting addition to any efficient and organized technical workspace.

Functional Features:This object is a sturdy and well-equipped multipurpose workbench, ideal for workshops, maker spaces, vocational classrooms, or light industrial settings. Its functional features include a spacious wooden tabletop suitable for assembly, sanding, measuring, or crafting tasks. A turquoise drawer on the right side provides convenient storage for frequently used tools or small components, supporting organized workflows. The yellow lower shelf enhances storage capacity and contributes to the bench’s overall stability. The design emphasizes practicality and space efficiency, supporting productive and orderly work environments.
Visual Features:Visually, the workbench combines a natural wood surface with a bright yellow metal frame and a turquoise drawer, creating a bold and modern color contrast. The tabletop is likely made of solid or composite wood, polished and sealed for durability and a smooth finish. The metal components are coated with a protective paint, offering a sleek appearance and resistance to rust and corrosion. The overall design is clean and structured, balancing functionality with aesthetic appeal, making it suitable for various technical or educational workspaces.

Functional Features:This object is a lockable mobile metal storage cabinet designed for secure and flexible use in workshops, laboratories, medical facilities, or educational environments. Its functional features include an open top shelf for quick access to frequently used items, with circular cutouts likely intended for cable management or ventilation. The middle section contains a lockable drawer for securing tools, instruments, or documents, while the bottom features a larger lockable compartment suitable for storing bulkier or sensitive items. Four swivel caster wheels provide excellent mobility, allowing the cabinet to be easily repositioned across work areas.
Visual Features:Visually, the cabinet is constructed from bright blue metal, offering a bold and modern appearance that enhances visibility and spatial organization. The surface is treated with a smooth powder coating, providing resistance to rust and wear—ideal for high-use environments. The overall structure is compact and well-proportioned, with clean lines that emphasize both functionality and aesthetic appeal. This cabinet is a practical and professional addition to any efficient and secure workspace.

Functional Features:This object is a double-pedestal office desk designed for use in offices, design studios, academic departments, or administrative environments where document organization and daily work tasks are essential. Its functional features include a spacious wooden tabletop suitable for writing, computer work, or organizing materials. Each side of the desk is equipped with four drawers, offering ample storage for files, stationery, tools, or personal items—enhancing workspace efficiency and tidiness. The structure is sturdy and built for frequent, long-term use, making it a practical and functional piece of office furniture.
Visual Features:Visually, the desk combines a light wood-colored top with gray metal drawer units, creating a soft yet professional contrast that reflects a modern industrial style. The tabletop is likely made of composite wood, polished or laminated for a smooth, easy-to-clean surface. The metal drawer pedestals are finished with a powder coating, providing a refined texture and resistance to rust and wear. Horizontal drawer handles contribute to the clean lines and cohesive appearance. The overall design is rectangular and streamlined, emphasizing functionality and space optimization—well-suited for various professional workspaces.

Functional Features:This object is a minimalist and functional office desk, ideal for administrative offices, faculty rooms, reception areas, or home study spaces where document organization and daily work tasks are essential. Its functional features include a spacious flat surface suitable for writing, computer use, or paperwork. The left pedestal contains four drawers for organizing stationery, files, or small office items, while the right pedestal features a lockable cabinet door for storing personal belongings or sensitive documents securely. The structure is sturdy and well-suited for frequent office use.
Visual Features:Visually, the desk is finished in a clean white color, reflecting a modern minimalist aesthetic that complements various office environments. The desktop and storage units are likely made from metal or high-density board, with a coated or laminated surface that offers durability and easy maintenance. The drawers and cabinet door feature recessed handles, contributing to a streamlined and cohesive appearance. The overall design is rectangular and tidy, emphasizing functionality and spatial efficiency—making it a practical and common choice in contemporary workspaces.

Functional Features:This object is a straightforward and functional metal desk designed for use in laboratories, workshops, technical offices, or educational environments where a stable work surface and organized storage are essential. Its functional features include a spacious flat tabletop suitable for writing, computer work, equipment placement, or documentation. The left side features four evenly spaced drawers for organizing tools, documents, or small devices, enhancing efficiency and workspace tidiness. The right side is supported by an open metal frame with a horizontal support bar, providing structural stability while allowing legroom for user comfort.
Visual Features:Visually, the desk is constructed from gray-white metal, reflecting a modern industrial aesthetic. The surfaces, including the top and drawer unit, are likely powder-coated for a smooth texture and enhanced resistance to rust and wear—ideal for high-use environments. The drawers have horizontal handles that contribute to the clean, unified appearance. The overall design is rectangular and well-proportioned, emphasizing durability and practicality, making it a common fixture in function-driven workspaces.

Functional Features:This object is a compact and fully functional stainless steel storage cabinet designed for use in laboratories, workshops, medical facilities, or other environments requiring cleanliness and security. Its functional features include a flat top surface suitable for placing equipment, tools, or performing light tasks. A raised back section with compartments allows for organized storage of small items or instruments. The middle section features a lockable drawer for secure storage of frequently used items, while the lower double-door cabinet, also lockable, accommodates larger or sensitive materials. The design emphasizes safety, organization, and efficient use of space—ideal for high-frequency work settings.
Visual Features:Visually, the cabinet is constructed from silver-gray stainless steel, embodying a modern industrial aesthetic. The surface is brushed or sandblasted for a refined texture, offering excellent corrosion resistance, durability, and ease of cleaning—especially important in hygiene-sensitive environments. The structure is rectangular and clean-lined, with recessed handles on the drawer and doors that enhance visual coherence and professional appearance. Overall, the cabinet is a practical and reliable fixture for secure and organized workspaces.

Functional Features:This object is a compact and functional metal workstation designed for use in laboratories, electronics assembly areas, repair workshops, or clean industrial environments. Its functional features include a flat main work surface suitable for precision tasks, equipment placement, or document handling. A raised back panel with a small compartment helps prevent items from falling and offers additional storage. The front includes a lockable drawer for secure storage of tools, instruments, or important documents. A lower open shelf enhances storage capacity and contributes to the bench’s structural stability.
Visual Features:Visually, the workstation is constructed from silver-gray metal, reflecting a modern industrial aesthetic. The design is clean and straightforward, with crisp lines that emphasize functionality and efficient space use.
